member.name: T:Troschuetz.Random.BinomialDistribution
member.summary: Provides generation of binomial distributed random numbers.
member.remarks:
The binomial distribution generates only discrete numbers.
The implementation of the type bases upon information presented on Wikipedia - Binomial distribution.

member.name: T:Troschuetz.Random.Distribution
member.summary: Declares common functionality for all random number distributions.

member.summary: Stores a object that can be used as underlying random number generator.

member.summary: Gets the mode of distributed random numbers.

member.name: T:Troschuetz.Random.ALFGenerator
member.summary: Represents a Additive Lagged Fibonacci pseudo-random number generator.
member.remarks: The type bases upon the implementation in the Boost Random Number Library. It uses the modulus 232 and by default the "lags" 418 and 1279, which can be adjusted through the associated and properties. Some popular pairs are presented on Wikipedia - Lagged Fibonacci generator.

member.name: T:Troschuetz.Random.Generator
member.summary: Declares common functionality for all random number generators.

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.Reset
member.summary: Resets the random number generator, so that it produces the same random number sequence again.
member.returns: , if the random number generator was reset; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.Next
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number less than .
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to 0, and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes 0 but not .

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. must be greater than or equal to 0.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to 0, and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes 0 but not .

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number within the specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number to be generated.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. must be greater than or equal to .
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to , and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes but not .

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative floating point random number less than 1.0.
member.returns: A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0; that is, the range of return values includes 0.0 but not 1.0.

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.NextDouble(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative floating point random number less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. must be greater than or equal to 0.0.
member.returns: A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes 0 but not .

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.NextDouble(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a floating point random number within the specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number to be generated. The range between and must be less than or equal to
The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. must be greater than or equal to . The range between and must be less than or equal to .
member.returns: A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to , and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes but not .

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.NextBoolean
member.summary: Returns a random Boolean value.
member.remarks: Buffers 31 random bits for future calls, so the random number generator is only invoked once in every 31 calls.
member.returns: A value.

member.name: M:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.
member.remarks: Each element of the array of bytes is set to a random number greater than or equal to 0, and less than or equal to .
member.param: An array of bytes to contain random numbers.

member.name: P:Troschuetz.Random.Generator.CanReset
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the random number generator can be reset, so that it produces the same random number sequence again.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.ALFGenerator.IntToDoubleMultiplier
member.summary: Represents the multiplier that computes a double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 when it gets applied to a nonnegative 32-bit signed integer.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.ALFGenerator.UIntToDoubleMultiplier
member.summary: Represents the multiplier that computes a double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 when it gets applied to a 32-bit unsigned integer.

member.summary: Stores the short lag of the Lagged Fibonacci pseudo-random number generator.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.ALFGenerator.longLag
member.summary: Stores the long lag of the Lagged Fibonacci pseudo-random number generator.

member.summary: Stores an array of random numbers

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.ALFGenerator.i
member.summary: Stores an index for the random number array element that will be accessed next.

member.summary: Stores an used to generate up to 32 random values.

member.name: T:Troschuetz.Random.XorShift128Generator
member.summary: Represents a xorshift pseudo-random number generator with period 2^128-1.
member.remarks: The type bases upon the implementation presented in the CP article "A fast equivalent for System.Random" and the theoretical background on xorshift random number generators published by George Marsaglia in this paper "Xorshift RNGs".

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.XorShift128Generator.SeedY
member.summary: Represents the seed for the variable. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 362436069.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.XorShift128Generator.SeedZ
member.summary: Represents the seed for the variable. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 521288629.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.XorShift128Generator.SeedW
member.summary: Represents the seed for the variable. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 88675123.

member.summary: Represents the multiplier that computes a double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 when it gets applied to a nonnegative 32-bit signed integer.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.XorShift128Generator.UIntToDoubleMultiplier
member.summary: Represents the multiplier that computes a double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 when it gets applied to a 32-bit unsigned integer.

member.name: T:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator
member.summary: Represents a Mersenne Twister pseudo-random number generator with period 2^19937-1.
member.remarks: The type bases upon information and the implementation presented on the Mersenne Twister Home Page.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.N
member.summary: Represents the number of unsigned random numbers generated at one time. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 624.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.M
member.summary: Represents a constant used for generation of unsigned random numbers. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 397.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.VectorA
member.summary: Represents the constant vector a. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 0x9908b0dfU.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.UpperMask
member.summary: Represents the most significant w-r bits. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 0x80000000.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.LowerMask
member.summary: Represents the least significant r bits. This field is constant.
member.remarks: The value of this constant is 0x7fffffff.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.IntToDoubleMultiplier
member.summary: Represents the multiplier that computes a double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 when it gets applied to a nonnegative 32-bit signed integer.

member.name: F:Troschuetz.Random.MT19937Generator.UIntToDoubleMultiplier
member.summary: Represents the multiplier that computes a double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 when it gets applied to a 32-bit unsigned integer.

member.summary: Stores the state vector array.

member.summary: Stores the used seed value.
